name: Electric Razor for Men: 3-in-1 Shaver with Hair Clipper and Nose Trimmer - 3D Floating Heads, USB-C Charging, IPX8 Waterproof - for Face, Beard, Body and Travel, Valentines Day Gifts for Him
short_description: 【3D Arc Blades for Ultimate Skin Fit】: Experience a superior shave with this advanced electric razor for men. Its 3D floating arc blades effortlessly adapt to the curves of your jawline, neck, and cheeks—delivering a smooth, irritation-free shave, even for sensitive skin.

【IPX8 Full Waterproof – Shave Any Way You Like】: Designed for modern routines, this electric shaver for men is fully submersible and perfect for wet or dry use. Shave comfortably with foam/gel in the shower, or go for a quick dry shave—then rinse easily under running water.

【All-in-One Grooming Kit with Hair & Nose Trimmers】: More than just a shaver—it’s a complete grooming system. This versatile electric razor for men comes with specialized attachments for trimming hair, detailing sideburns, and neatly grooming nose hair.

【Smart Travel Lock & Long-Lasting Battery】: Ideal for busy lifestyles, this electric shaver for men features a smart travel lock (activate by holding the power button for 3 seconds) to prevent accidental activation. Enjoy fast Type-C charging and up to 90 minutes of run time.

【Premium Package with Confidence Guarantee】: Get everything you need: the electric razor for men, hair clipper, nose trimmer, Type-C cable, brush, and user guide. Backed by a 24-month warranty and friendly customer support for total peace of mind. An excellent choice among men's Valentine's Day gifts, ideal for birthdays, Father's Day, Christmas, or Valentines Day Gifts for Him.

name: Philips Norelco Shaver 7600, Rechargeable Wet & Dry Electric Shaver with SenseIQ Technology, Quick Clean Pod, Travel Case & Pop-up Trimmer, S7886/84
short_description: Made of up to 250,000 micro-tech beads per square cm, Nano SkinGlide coating improves gliding on skin by up to 30%*, to minimize irritation.
With up to 90,000 cutting actions per minute, the SteelPrecision blades shave close, cutting more hair per stroke*. The 45 high-performance blades are self-sharpening and made in Europe.
The intelligent facial-hair sensor reads hair density 250 times per second. The technology dynamically auto-adapts cutting power for an effortless and gentle shave.
Motion-sensing technology tracks how you shave and guides you to an improved shaving technique with fewer passes.
USB-A charging cable included (wall power adapter not included).
Fully flexible heads turn 360° to follow your facial contours. Experience optimal skin contact for a thorough and comfortable shave.
Charge your shaver fully in just 1 hour with the powerful and energy efficient lithium-ion battery. In a hurry? Plug in your shaver for 5 minutes and get enough power for 1 full shave.
Adapt your shaving routine to your needs. With Wet & Dry, you can go for a comfortable dry shave or a refreshing wet shave. You can shave with gel or foam even under the shower.
product_description: The Philips Norelco Shaver 7600 glides smoothly over your skin, while cutting each hair close - even on 3-day beards. An LED battery indicator clearly shows the remaining power of the electric razor. For complete peace of mind on the go, simply activate the travel lock by holding the power button for 3 seconds, preventing any accidental startup when your men's clippers is packed away.

IPX6 Waterproof & Easy Clean: Designed for wet/dry versatility, this mustache trimmer for men easily rinses clean under the tap after use, whether dry shaving or using foam. Clean the blades with the included brush, let the electric trimmer air dry, and occasionally apply a drop of oil to maintain peak performance. This men's shaving kit is built for convenience.

Perfect Gift for Him & Mens Valentines Day Gifts: With its premium design and all-in-one functionality—capable of expertly trimming beards, hair, nose, and body hair—this beard trimmer for men makes a thoughtful gift for dads, sons, partners, boyfriend, or any man who appreciates top grooming tools. name: Philips Norelco All-in-One 3000 Series 13 in 1 Trimmer for Men, Beard Trimmer & Head Hair Clipper, Full Metal Self-Sharpening Blades & 8 Length Settings, MG3939/50
short_description: SELF-SHARPENING FULL METAL BLADES stay as sharp as day one and do not require oiling
13-IN-ONE TRIMMER choose from 13 pieces to trim your beard, head, nose and ear hair; 8 length settings (0.5mm-16 mm) for a wide range of styles from clean stubble to long beard.
DETAIL TRIMMER the click-on narrow trimmer blade adds extra definition effortlessly to the details, crafting your look with precision
ERGONOMIC HANDLE makes the trimmer easy to hold and maneuver, providing you with the comfort and control you need to perfect your look
POWERFUL BATTERY delivers up to 60 minutes of runtime and the battery indicator light makes charging easier; USB-A charger cable, NO wall adapter included
RINSEABLE blade and combs for easy cleaning
product_description:
Try out a new look any day of the week with the durable Philips Norelco All-in-one 3000 electric trimmer for beards and head use. With 13 attachments, self-sharpening metal beard trimmer blades for long-lasting precision, and rounded tips for gentler trimming, this versatile and efficient electric razor for men efficiently tackles all your grooming needs.
 
 Effortlessly trim and style with precision blades, beard combs, and attachable detail trimmer that deliver clean, straight lines. Use the adjustable hair-clipping comb for quick touchups at home. Plus, easily remove unwanted nose and ear hair without nicks or cuts with the nose hair trimmer attachment.
 
 Experience gentle and comfortable cordless grooming with unique Philips Norelco blade technology featuring rounded tips for a softer touch on your skin. The tool's ergonomic grip allows for easy handling and maneuverability, giving you the comfort and control needed to achieve your ideal facial hair look or hairstyle. Philips Norelco multigroom attachments resist bending and the removable heads rinse clean for quick maintenance.
 
 Built to last, the durable battery in this men's all in one trimmer offers up to 60 minutes of runtime for uninterrupted beard grooming or hair cutting. The light indicator shows the battery charging status. With USB-A charging, it's easy to power up anywhere (adapter not included).
 
 The Philips Norelco All-in-One 3000 Series comes with a warranty of up to 5 years¹.
 
 ¹ 2 years + 3 years warranty upon registration within 90 days on Philips.com

product_description:
Trust the #1 Electric shaver brand¹ and choose Philips Norelco Shaver 22400 Series: wet and dry electric shaver that gives you a fast, clean shave, even on sensitive skin.
 
 Its 27 self-sharpening ComfortCut Blades have a 2-year lifetime which makes your shaver perform like new every day. They cut each hair right above skin level for a smooth finish, while the 4D Pivot & Flex Heads follow your facial contour, protecting it from nicks and cuts. The blades are made from hypoallergenic steel to resist corrosion, prevent impurities, and protect your skin. 
 
 Shave wet or dry and take care of defining your mustache or sideburns with the pop-up trimmer. Clean the device at the touch of a button with one-touch open to easily rinse under the tap. 
 
 A durable NiMH battery provides 40 minutes of shaving time on a single 1-hour charge. A 5-minute quick charge gives you enough power for one shave when in a hurry. Charge with a USB-A charging cable (power adapter not included).
